entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, who is feeling down and wants to talk to Sirius.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is Harry's friend, who tries to console him and help him talk to Sirius.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a person that Harry wants to talk to, but knows he can't.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is mentioned as someone Ginny suggests Harry talk to, but Harry says it's not her he wants to talk to.

entities.name: madam pince
entities.description: Madam Pince is a librarian who is stamping out books in the background.

entities.name: hannah abbott
entities.description: Hannah Abbott is a student who looks frantic and is watching Madam Pince.

relationships.description: Harry wants to talk to Sirius, but knows he can't.
Ginny tries to console Harry and help him talk to Sirius.
